events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen has several scratches and the keyboard keys are sticking, which makes it very difficult to use.
The reported issue involves physical damage and defects on the product, categorizing this case under Product Defect for proper handling.
This case has been assigned to customer support agent Alex for further assistance and follow-up regarding the defective laptop.
Hello, I’m Alex from the support team. I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’ll do my best to help you resolve this problem quickly.
Could you please provide some photos of the scratches on the screen and the keyboard so we can evaluate the damage and proceed with the next steps?
I have attached clear pictures showing the scratches on the screen and the sticky keys. It’s disappointing to get a damaged product like this.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit shipped at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option you would like to proceed with.
I would prefer to receive a replacement laptop. Thank you for offering this solution so promptly.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We will send you tracking information as soon as it’s available.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and to ensure everything is working perfectly now.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it works perfectly. Thank you very much for the fast and helpful support!
We’re glad to hear the replacement meets your expectations. Closing this case now, and please contact us if you need any further assistance.
